data.comment: Ufa kick-off the first half - the match is underway!
Can Rubin Kazan get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Ufa's half?
In the minute 2, Throw-in for Ufa in the half of Rubin Kazan.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Ufa needs to be cautious. Rubin Kazan have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 4, Rubin Kazan's Darko Jevtic gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Ufa defender.
Rubin Kazan have been awarded a corner by Pavel Kukuyan.
Mikhail Merkulov for Rubin Kazan gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 5, Ufa have a goal kick.
Corner awarded to Rubin Kazan.
Filip Uremovic (Rubin Kazan) goes close with a header but the ball is scrambled away by Ufa defenders.
In the minute 9, In Kazan a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Rubin Kazan's Oliver Abildgaard breaks free at Kazan Arena. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Goal kick for Ufa at Kazan Arena.
In the minute 11, In Kazan Ufa's Aleksandr Sukhov is caught offside.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Kazan.
Free kick Ufa.
In the minute 13, Ball safe as Rubin Kazan is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Oleg Danchenko gets his shot on target but fails to score for Ufa.
Pavel Kukuyan awards Ufa a goal kick.
In the minute 16, Rubin Kazan to take a throw-in in Ufa territory.
Throw-in Ufa.
Ufa will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Rubin Kazan.
In the minute 18, Pavel Kukuyan awards the away team a throw-in.
Corner awarded to Rubin Kazan.
Throw-in for Rubin Kazan in their own half.
In the minute 21, Darko Jevtic (Rubin Kazan) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Ball goes out of play for a Ufa goal kick.
Rubin Kazan awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 23, Djordje Despotovic (Rubin Kazan) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
Ball goes out of play for a Ufa goal kick.
Rubin Kazan awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 25, Oleg Shatov of Rubin Kazan smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Throw-in high up the field for Rubin Kazan in Kazan.
Pavel Kukuyan signals a free kick to Rubin Kazan in their own half.
In the minute 28, Ufa have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Rubin Kazan at Kazan Arena.
Pavel Kukuyan awards Rubin Kazan a goal kick.
In the minute 30, Pavel Kukuyan awards the away team a throw-in.
Ufa drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
Free kick for Ufa in their own half.
In the minute 36, Pavel Kukuyan signals a free kick to Rubin Kazan in their own half.
Aleksandr Sukhov for Ufa has been booked by Pavel Kukuyan and receives a first yellow card.
Rubin Kazan awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 38, Throw-in for Ufa in the half of Rubin Kazan.
In Kazan Ufa attack through Aleksandr Sukhov. The finish is off target, however.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Kazan.
In the minute 40, Rubin Kazan's Khvicha Kvaratskhelia gets in a shot on goal at Kazan Arena. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Rubin Kazan pushes forward through Soltmurad Bakaev, whose finish on goal is saved.
Throw-in Rubin Kazan.
In the minute 42, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In Kazan Rubin Kazan drive forward through Khvicha Kvaratskhelia. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Rubin Kazan have been awarded a corner by Pavel Kukuyan.
In the minute 44, Rubin Kazan's Khvicha Kvaratskhelia gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Pavel Kukuyan signals a Ufa throw-in in Rubin Kazan's half.
The first-half has come to a close in Kazan.
In the minute 46, The ref has blown to start the second-half. Rubin Kazan kick-off.
Hwang In-beom is replacing Oleg Shatov for Rubin Kazan at Kazan Arena.
The home team replace Soltmurad Bakaev with Denis Makarov.
In the minute 47, Goal! Rubin Kazan have got their heads in front thanks to a Hwang In-beom strike.
Lovro Bizjak for the away team is judged to be offside.
Corner awarded to Rubin Kazan.
In the minute 51, Free kick for Ufa in the half of Rubin Kazan.
Khvicha Kvaratskhelia for Rubin Kazan drives towards goal at Kazan Arena. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Ufa are caught offside.
Darko Jevtic for Rubin Kazan gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Goal kick for Ufa at Kazan Arena.
In the minute 54, At Kazan Arena, Olivier Thill has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Throw-in for Rubin Kazan in their own half.
In the minute 55, Goal! Denis Makarov extends Rubin Kazan's lead to 2-0.
Pavel Kukuyan signals a free kick to Ufa.
In the minute 59, Ufa have been awarded a corner by Pavel Kukuyan.
Ball goes out of play for a Rubin Kazan goal kick.
Ufa make their third substitution with Nikita Belousov replacing Aleksandr Sukhov.
Timur Zhamaletdinov is on a sub for Lovro Bizjak for Ufa.
In the minute 59, Kirill Folmer is replacing Artem Golubev for the away team.
Ufa have been awarded a corner by Pavel Kukuyan.
In the minute 61, Corner awarded to Ufa.
Ufa have been awarded a corner by Pavel Kukuyan.
Free kick for Rubin Kazan in their own half.
In the minute 64, Rubin Kazan's Djordje Despotovic breaks free at Kazan Arena. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Ufa have a goal kick.
In the minute 65, Pavel Kukuyan signals a free kick to Ufa.
Ufa awarded a free kick in their own half.
Djordje Despotovic is booked for the home team.
In Kazan Ufa drive forward through Timur Zhamaletdinov. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 68, Ufa to take a throw-in in Rubin Kazan territory.
Throw-in for Ufa at Kazan Arena.
Goal! Rubin Kazan extend their lead to 3-0 through Denis Makarov.
In the minute 69, Khvicha Kvaratskhelia instrumental with a fine assist.
Denis Makarov gets his shot on target but fails to score for Rubin Kazan.
Important block from the Rubin Kazan defence as Azer Aliev fires in a strike for Ufa.
In the minute 72, Pavel Alikin (Ufa) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Attention is being given to Rubin Kazan’s Ivan Ignatyev and play has been suspended briefly.
Vadim Evseev (Ufa) is making a fourth substitution, with Gamid Agalarov replacing Andres Vombergar.
In the minute 74, Free kick Rubin Kazan.
Corner awarded to Rubin Kazan.
Pavel Kukuyan signals a free kick to Ufa in their own half.
In the minute 75, Ufa's Kirill Folmer is on target but unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to Ufa.
Free kick for Rubin Kazan in their own half.
In the minute 77, Ivan Ignatyev for Rubin Kazan is back on the field again.
Pavel Kukuyan signals a free kick to Rubin Kazan in their own half.
The away team have replaced Andres Vombergar with Gamid Agalarov. This is the fifth substitution made today by Vadim Evseev.
In the minute 81, In Kazan a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Khvicha Kvaratskhelia (Rubin Kazan) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Rubin Kazan have been awarded a corner by Pavel Kukuyan.
In the minute 82, Rubin Kazan are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
Khvicha Kvaratskhelia for Rubin Kazan drives towards goal at Kazan Arena. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Free kick for Rubin Kazan in their own half.
Ufa are whistled for offside.
In the minute 84, Rubin Kazan make their third substitution with Ivan Ignatyev replacing Djordje Despotovic.
Leonid Slutskiy is making the team's fourth substitution at Kazan Arena with Ilya Samoshnikov replacing Aleksandr Zuev.
Free kick for Rubin Kazan in the half of Ufa.
In the minute 86, Igor Bezdenezhnykh (Ufa) has received a yellow card from Pavel Kukuyan.
The home team replace Filip Uremovic with Dmitri Tarasov.
In the minute 88, Free kick Rubin Kazan.
Ball safe as Ufa is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In Kazan a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 89, Can Rubin Kazan get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Ufa's half?
Ufa awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick for Ufa in the half of Rubin Kazan.
2 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Ufa to take a throw-in in Rubin Kazan territory.
Rubin Kazan awarded a throw-in in their own half.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 3-0.
